name: DPoS super node
shortDesc:
In this H5 app,
* You can vote your DPoS supernodes without sending your ELA out,
* You can spend your ELA anytime after vote,
* We will automatically help you keep your last votes using your balance when you spend your ELA.
shortDesc_en:
In this H5 app,
* You can vote your DPoS supernodes without sending your ELA out,
* You can spend your ELA anytime after vote,
* We will automatically help you keep your last votes using your balance when you spend your ELA.
shortDesc_zh_CN: 在这个小程序里可以借助大象钱包对DPoS节点进行投票。您不必将ELA转出大象钱包即可参与DPoS选举投票，同时您还可以正常进行转账交易，不必担心之前的投票失效，因为每次转账交易都可以自动帮您投出上一次的选票。
longDesc:
DPoS supernodes voting H5 app is live inside Elephant wallet app now !

In this H5 app,
* You can vote your DPoS supernodes without sending your ELA out,
* You can spend your ELA anytime after vote,
* We will automatically help you keep your last votes using your balance when you spend your ELA.

Key features:
* View all supernodes and details: ranking, votes and estimated annual profit
* Favorite supernodes
* Vote in favorites fast
* View voting history and revote easily
* Auto keep my last vote using balance when spending ELA
* Vote labeling in transaction history

For detailed voting rules:
https://news.elastos.org/elastos-dpos-supernode-election-process/
longDesc_en:
DPoS supernodes voting H5 app is live inside Elephant wallet app now !

In this H5 app,

longDesc_zh_CN:
DPoS超级节点投票小程序功能上线啦！

在这个小程序里可以借助大象钱包对DPoS节点进行投票。您不必将ELA转出大象钱包即可参与DPoS选举投票，同时您还可以正常进行转账交易，不必担心之前的投票失效，因为每次转账交易都可以自动帮您投出上一次的选票。

小程序功能：
1. 查看所有参与竞选的节点以及详情：投票排行榜、该节点获得的票数以及预期可能获得的收益；
2. 收藏节点作为候选节点、取消收藏；
3. 在收藏列表批量选择节点进行投票；
4. 查看投票记录以及详情，查看资产的投票利用率以及重新投票；
5. 进行ELA转账交易的时候，可以选择将剩余的ELA同时投票；
6. ELA交易记录显示投票交易标签；

欢迎Elephant社区成员积极参与体验投票小程序。

具体投票规则参见：

https://news-zh.elastos.org/%E4%BA%A6%E6%9D%A5%E4%BA%91dpos%E8%B6%85%E7%BA%A7%E8%8A%82%E7%82%B9%E7%AB%9E%E9%80%89%E7%BB%86%E5%88%99/
